page.title: 08INDUSTRY - GLOUCESTER WEST
page.content: BIG CHANGES ARE HAPPENING IN 3 AREAS. A Â£50 MILLION REDEVELOPMENT OF THE OLD REDUNDANT GLOUCESTER DOCK AND AREA HAS BEGUN TO ATTRACT BUSINESS ON BRISTOL ROAD.OUTDATED FIRMS CLOSED OR INTRODUCED NEW TECHNOLOGY SUCH AS GLOUCESTER WAGON CO. NOW MAKING BOGIE WHEELS. THE FORMER "ENGLAND'S GLORY" MATCH FACTORY SITE HAS 57 FIRMS MANINLY ENGINEERING USING MODERN MATERIALS IN THEIR PRODUCTS. A 17 ACRE SITE FORMERLY BABCOCK TRACTORS IS NOW REDUNDANT AND FOR SALE. BETTER M.4 MOTORWAY ACCESS HAS BROUGHT NEW FIRMS OR THEIR EXPANSIONS FURTHER SOUTH ALONG BRISTOL RD. AND CANAL SIDE WHARVES. PLASTICS, CHEMICALS, FIBREGLASS,JOINERY,BUILDING TRADE,MOTOR ENGINEERS,CIVIL ENGINEERS AND HEAVY ENGINEERING FIRMS HAVE OR ARE BUILDING PREMISES.
